Eatery////I can't wait to come back (and I've already been twice in two weeks).  It gets busy on the weekends (one server said the wait can exceed 2 hrs).  I came on a Thursday morning and waited 5-10 minutes for a table.  There is free coffee in the waiting area and they take your phone number so you can leave the restaurant to wander around Montrose.  Parking is limited
column3: but you can park across the street.
